title: [Large-Scale] Intensive Short-Term Course on Online Collaboration and Team Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online collaboration tools and foundational understanding of team projects
context.additional_context: Customized collaborative skills training for professionals emphasizing practical learning via real-time interaction and task performance

learning_goals: Learners can apply five core collaborative processes, including team planning, role distribution, and progress sharing, in an online environment.
Learners can effectively communicate and delegate tasks with remote team members using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can analyze conflict situations arising during online team projects and propose mediation strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
